seo_en: SQL injection, high-risk header injection, X-Forwarded-For, Referer
summary: 该插件用于检测HTTP请求头中的高风险字段（如X-Forwarded-For、Referer）是否存在SQL注入漏洞，通过构造多种payload进行测试并报告风险。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect SQL injection vulnerabilities in high-risk HTTP headers (such as X-Forwarded-For and Referer) by constructing various payloads for testing and reporting risks.
